summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 10 requirements from the BuildRequest. Backend data models, CRUD operations, and transaction management are implemented in Motoko. Frontend includes customer management interface, ledger transaction views, forms with validation, and warm earth tone UI theme. The ledger icon reference is present in Layout.tsx, though the actual image file is not visible in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration with login/logout functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies 'Internet Identity authentication' only as a non-goal constraint (not beyond basic auth), but the implementation includes full InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook with login/clear/status management, and actor authentication flow. This goes beyond what was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode theme support via ThemeProvider
hallucinated_features.reason: Dark mode was not requested in REQ-9 or any other requirement. The BuildRequest only asks for a professional UI with warm earth tones, not theme switching capability.

hallucinated_features.description: getTransaction backend function for retrieving individual transactions by ID
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 specifies functions to create transactions, get all transactions for a customer, get customer balance, and get all transactions. A function to retrieve a single transaction by ID was not requested.
